item.description:
*****Rain Update***********

Since the showers have moved in, we are going to move the event to the food court at The Steeplegate Mall. Denise is stopping off at the state house first and then will head up, I will head there as soon as I finish editing. Please be on the lookout to welcome some new/not so regular members looking for us. -Sarah

The event is going to run from 10am to 2pm. We'll be meeting on the State House lawn in Concord, New Hampshire. Bring a chair and whatever food you'd like to eat and/or share.

The World Wide Knit in Public Day site is:

http://www.wwkipday.c...
item.name: WWKIP - World Wide Knit in Public Day
